`,(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.pre,{children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.code,{className:"language-typescript",children:`async function createPost(formData: FormData) {
  'use server'
  
  const title = formData.get('title')
  const content = formData.get('content')
  
  // Save to database
  await db.post.create({
    data: { title, content }
  })
}

export default function CreatePost() {
  return (
    <form action={createPost}>
      <input name="title" placeholder="Post title" />
      <textarea name="content" placeholder="Post content" />
      <button type="submit">Create Post</button>
    </form>
  )
}

export default function BlogPage() {
  return (
    <div>
      <h1>Blog</h1>
      <p>Welcome to our blog!</p>
    </div>
  )
}

// app/blog/[slug]/page.tsx
export default function BlogPost({ params }: { params: { slug: string } }) {
  return (
    <div>
      <h1>Post: {params.slug}</h1>
    </div>
  )
}

`,(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.pre,{children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.code,{className:"language-typescript",children:`// This runs on the server
async function BlogPosts() {
  const posts = await fetch('https://api.example.com/posts')
  const data = await posts.json()
  
  return (
    <div>
      {data.map(post => (
        <article key={post.id}>
          <h2>{post.title}</h2>
          <p>{post.excerpt}</p>
        </article>
      ))}
    </div>
  )
}
`},void 0,!1,{fileName:"/Users/benjaminwilliams/Personal_manager_test/drew-hub/content/posts/_mdx_bundler_entry_point-c7b7bdc2-0234-44fd-a9ab-85dbd93ae8a6.mdx",lineNumber:108,columnNumber:1},this)},void 0,!1,{fileName:"/Users/benjaminwilliams/Personal_manager_test/drew-hub/content/posts/_mdx_bundler_entry_point-c7b7bdc2-0234-44fd-a9ab-85dbd93ae8a6.mdx",lineNumber:108,columnNumber:1},this),`

`,(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.pre,{children:(0,n.jsxDEV)(e.code,{className:"language-typescript",children:`// Static generation with ISR
export const revalidate = 3600 // 1 hour

// Dynamic with caching
export async function GET(request: Request) {
  const data = await fetchData()
  
  return Response.json(data, {
    headers: {
      'Cache-Control': 'max-age=3600, stale-while-revalidate=86400'
    }
  })
}
`},void 0,!1,{fileName:"/Users/benjaminwilliams/Personal_manager_test/drew-hub/content/posts/_mdx_bundler_entry_point-c7b7bdc2-0234-44fd-a9ab-85dbd93ae8a6.mdx",lineNumber:181,columnNumber:1},this)},void 0,!1,{fileName:"/Users/benjaminwilliams/Personal_manager_test/drew-hub/content/posts/_mdx_bundler_entry_point-c7b7bdc2-0234-44fd-a9ab-85dbd93ae8a6.mdx",lineNumber:181,columnNumber:1},this),`
